sentences.sContent: The officer buckled on his pistol.
He stowed a small pistol in her handbag.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stowed a small pistol in her handbag.
sentences.sCn: 他在她的手袋里藏了一把小手枪。

sentences.sContent: He hopped back up the stairs and took his pistol.
sentences.sContent_eng: He hopped back up the stairs and took his pistol.
sentences.sCn: 他赶紧返回到楼上，拿上了他的手枪。

phrases.pCn: [戏谑语、口语](可藏在衣袋里的)小酒瓶 [亦作pocket-pistol]

trans.tranOther: a small gun you can use with one hand
